attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Sir,It is my contention that Trevor Phillips causes more racial tensions than he prevents.May I suggest that you have a look at 'Have Your Say' on the BBC website to see the hatred that Mr Phillips is creating.

rejection.details: The CEHR are a non-departmental public body  established under the Equality Act 2006 and therefore independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
